Description: Lower part of a limestone stela; representation of a figure wearing a vestment; leaf border.
Bibliographic references: Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Adams 1977 / Egyptian objects in the Victoria and Albert Museum (p.44)
